ComicInfo.Title: Troubles with Gassel; The Adventures of Onion Head; Karen Meets Boz; My Pet Penis; "Hy" Perboly and Al A. Gory; Excerpts from Boswell's London Journal 1762-1763; The Adventures of Skank, Arms & Bud!; Frogs

ComicInfo.Summary:
Troubles with Gassel: Morrie is caught short needing a dump.
The Adventures of Onion Head: Onion Head leaves the farm for the wider world.
Karen Meets Boz: Karen approaches Boz Scaggs in a bar.
My Pet Penis: A girl discovers a pet penis.
"Hy" Perboly and Al A. Gory: Mutants ponder life.
Excerpts from Boswell's London Journal 1762-1763: Boswell carouses and discusses literature in London
The Adventures of Skank, Arms & Bud!: Skank, Arms & Bud have a night out.
Frogs: Bizarre behaviour by frogs.
